item.title: Goals for the second half of 2014
item.description: Here is my mid-year (I know I am off by couple of months) review of my blogging and learning goals for 2014. I will start off with my assessment of the first half of 2014 and then wrap with goals for the remaining four months of this year. Status of 2014 first half goals Complete the Understanding Virtual Networks series –Â Finish the introductory blogs about OpenStack Networking and Open vSwitch Status Update – The OpenStack networking blog was completed as per plan but I could not cover Open vSwitch in detail.
